title: How to draw an outline in a video game
dot:
digraph RenderingOutlines{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];Introduction[label="Rendering Outlines
Aesthetic & Gameplay Highlights"]; Techniques[label="Techniques for Rendering Outlines"];RimEffects[label="1. Rim Effects
- Uses Fresnel Effect
- Works well on spherical objects
- Inner outlines only"];VertexExtrusion[label="2. Vertex Extrusion
- Duplicate mesh with extruded vertices
- Can use custom normals
- Issues with sharp corners"];BlurredBuffer[label="3. Blurred Buffer
- Silhouette buffer blurred
- Soft/glowy outlines
- Performance intensive"];JumpFlood[label="4. Jump Flood Algorithm
- Efficient wide outlines
- Good performance"];EdgeDetection[label="5. Edge Detection
- Detects discontinuities
- Can use various operators (Roberts, Sobel)
- Full-screen effect"];Conclusion[label="Conclusion
- Trade-offs between performance, visual fidelity, and setup"];Introduction->Techniques;Techniques->RimEffects;Techniques->VertexExtrusion;Techniques->BlurredBuffer;Techniques->JumpFlood;Techniques->EdgeDetection;Techniques->Conclusion;}

title: Breaking Up with Long Tasks or: how I learned to group loops and wield the yield
dot:
digraph responsive_interaction{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style="rounded, filled", fillcolor="#f4f4f4", fontname="Helvetica"];subgraph cluster_task_problem{label="Problem: Long Tasks and Unresponsive UI";style=dashed;color=gray;task1[label="Synchronous Loops
(for..of, forEach, map)", shape=ellipse, color=lightblue];task2[label="Long task blocking interaction", color=lightyellow];task3[label="Input delay
Slow INP performance", color=lightyellow];task1->task2->task3;}subgraph cluster_optimization{label="Optimization: Break Up Long Tasks";style=dashed;color=gray;opt1[label="Async/Await
(setTimeout, scheduler.yield)", color=lightgreen];opt2[label="Use for..of loop", color=lightgreen];opt3[label="Batching with Time-based Yielding", color=lightgreen];opt4[label="Prioritize Responsive Interaction", color=lightgreen];opt1->opt2->opt3->opt4;}subgraph cluster_batching{label="Advanced Batching: Balance Speed and Responsiveness";style=dashed;color=gray;batch1[label="Batch by Time (e.g., 50ms)", color=lightyellow];batch2[label="Set reasonable batch durations", color=lightyellow];batch3[label="Adjust based on CPU speed", color=lightyellow];batch1->batch2->batch3;}subgraph cluster_frame_rate{label="Frame Rate Optimization";style=dashed;color=gray;frame1[label="Use requestAnimationFrame
for smoother UI", color=lightblue];frame2[label="Minimize yields for faster processing", color=lightblue];frame3[label="Optimize for 30 FPS (frame duration 33ms)", color=lightblue];frame1->frame2->frame3;}task3->opt1[label="Solution"];opt4->batch1[label="Fine-tune with batching"];batch3->frame1[label="Smoother experience"];}
